notes.title: Create Github Repository
notes.text: Create the repository for the Note Taker challenge for module 11 along with the .gitignore file

notes.title: Install dependencies for backend
notes.text: Start by initializing node with 'npm init', then install required dependencies like express and our chosen package for the unique ID generator

notes.title: Route the required files
notes.text: Create appropriate directories and rename required files to accurately navigate to the pages

notes.title: Create a hub for server
notes.text: In a server javascript file, create a hub for all the routes to meet and navigate through to send and receive the appropriate information

notes.title: Write appropriate actions for front end
notes.text: Create actions that are routed to the backend database that allows the user to create new data, remove data and access the data

notes.title: Prepare the assignment for submission
notes.text: Write a professional readme to present your assignment to be graded. Deploy the application on heroku and test out the required functionality for the MVP, followed by the bonus and any extra functionality
